fn.p: How to cite this article: Mupakati, T. & Tanyanyiwa, V.I., 2017, ‘Cassava production as a climate change adaptation strategy in Chilonga Ward, Chiredzi District, Zimbabwe’, Jàmbá: Journal of Disaster Risk Studies 9(1), a348. https://doi.org/10.4102/jamba.v9i1.348
